name: Witch Type Of Evil
description:
Witch Type Of Evil is a typing game! Type the purple text to interact with the game.

Escape key resets the current input.

Summon creatures by typing their names and enchant the summoned fighters by typing out spells. Level up your creatures to stand a chance against the forest!

gotm: https://gotm.io/enbygames/witchtypeofevil

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
